article_title: 1 dead, 1 seriously hurt in vehicle crashes in Ephrata and Manor townships
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , vehicle crash, fatality, coroner, motorcycle, dui
article_metadata.author: BRETT HAMBRIGHT | Staff Writer

og.description: An Ephrata motorcyclist was killed and a Leola man seriously hurt in separate crashes just minutes apart late Friday night in Lancaster County, police said.
